name: Calm of the misty trip
description:
The Visual Novel Calm of the Misty Trip created for the (10days) VN game jam.

If the music is off just activate it in sound menu. (its just prefs setings)

This story is solo made, not long, and have black pencil sketch sprites instead of digital art. (dont get a artist) The sfx and Music are just simple.

PS: For Pc version there is this not a lag but like the game got only 60% of speed.

Web> Firefox had broken layout but edge worked, but on 40% of speed [If not working at all please use windows version and report.]

Use Mouse to click on buttons like (next on right) and possibly space bar or enter to push forward to next page of book. The game is short cca 6.000 words so dont press break on option menu it will break the game.
